context: Hi Im good how are you?
Still a little tired, but I'm fine overall. What kind of movies do you like?
Yea me too! I like pretty much anything.
Nice, for comedy, have you ever seen This Is the End (2013) ?
No, I havent what is it about?
It's about the end of the world, but it was pretty hilarious. Seth Rogan is in it, Danny McBride
a whole bunch of comedic actors are in it
Sound like it would be good.
resp: I know Kevin Hart had a part in it, too. Have you seen Tropic Thunder (2008) ?
